column2: "ARKS... The ARKS ship remained in their universe after that incident."
"Perhaps they decided this world was saved, and didn't want to interfere where they didn't need to, aside from dealing with Phantoms?"
"I haven't met them ever since that day... Since I had tons of things to do when I got back, I haven't gotten a chance to visit."
"Maybe they realized how busy we were, they haven't visited us either..."
"I wanted them to give us some attention, but... I guess that's okay."
"It'll just be a bigger surprise that way."
"Huh..? Oh! It's Ms. Hitsugi and Aru! Welcome, we've been expecting you!"
"What's wrong, Ms. Hitsugi? Are you perhaps looking for someone?"
"Xiera... You know exactly who I'm looking for."
"Of course, I know who! <%me>! Ms. Hitsugi is here!"
"Ah, <%me>... um... that is... Ah, ah, what was I going to say? I, uhm..."
"<%me>! I'm sorry to keep you waiting! Let's go on an Adventure together!"
"Oh, before you go on that adventure! Ms. Hitsugi and Aru, let's go to the shop area!"
"You'd be hurry! Something amazing is happening!"
